sense.def:
Osebe, ki vodijo neko skupino ali organizacijo, lahko imenujemo
the leadership
.

seg.quote: ...the gap between the leadership and the men they represent.

sense.def:
The leadership
je tudi nadzorovanje skupine ali organizacije.

seg.quote: ...the election of Wilson to the leadership of the Labour Party.
...an independent group under the leadership of Jones.

sense.def:
Leadership
se nanaša na lastnosti, ki iz nekoga naredijo dobrega voditelja.

seg.quote: ...a task calling for energy and firm leadership.
